afc based on...

A simple SVG BarChart #3

Uses Scales, Axes and, of course, Selection to put a bar chart into an SVG.

Open

Code:

Data:

type Pair = { letter :: Char, frequency :: Number }
frequencies :: Array Pair
frequencies = [
    { letter: 'A',	frequency: 0.08167 }
